quote: People Must Learn To Hate And If They Can Learn To Hate, They Can Be Taught To Love.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: When we tackle obstacles, we find hidden reserves of courage and resilience we did not know we had. And it is only when we are faced with failure do we realise that these resources were always there within us. We only need to find them and move on with our lives.
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: Do not follow vain desires; for verily he who prospers is preserved from lust, greed and anger.
author: Abu Bakr (R.A)

quote: The Good Life Is One Inspired By Love And Guided By Knowledge.
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: Things Won Are Done, Joy'S Soul Lies In The Doing.
author: William Shakespeare
